Selling Points: A rare find. This is the 16valve 2.3 litre Cosworth engine, 5speed transmission, light champagne color. Only about 2000 of these cars were imported, all in 19861987 and less than half had manual transmissions. I bought this car twelve years ago and have driven it less than 10,000 miles never in the snow or even the rain. Always garaged. The engine was completely rebuilt by a Mercedestrained mechanic shortly after I bought it.I dont drive the car enough to justify keeping it. Email me for more information. 

Condition: Excellent condition no rust, no cracks in dash, no wear on the leather. Rebuilt engine runs a little rough needs a good Mercedes specialist to tune it. I live in upstate NY and did not have the A/C reconnected during the rebuilding.

Seller's Notes: Thank you for choosing Beverly Hills BMW located in California. We are a Sonic Automotive Premier Dealership and strive every day to make your experience with us unforgettable. Sonic Automotive is one of the largest automotive retailers in the United States and a true leader in the industry. Our mission is to be one of America's best places to work and shop. Our dealerships offer a variety of services from new and used vehicle sales, warranty, extended warranty, collision repair, parts replacement, financing and insurance. Best of all, we offer a competitive price on each and every vehicle we sell. By using the selling price of similar vehicles in your market, we can assure that you are being offered a price that is straightforward, accurate, and in line with what you've likely researched. This eliminates the need for haggling and negotiations and puts the focus on finding you the vehicle of your dreams. Throughout the car shopping experience, we strive to provide the price you want, the knowledge you need and a dealership you can trust. Seller's Notes: NO-HAGGLE PRICING FOR YOUR CONVENIENCE! Earth MotorCars is very excited to present this COVERED & GARAGE-KEPT, impeccably maintained, incredible condition 1993 Mercedes-Benz 190 E. This German luxury sedan is absolutely stunning inside & out, and is priced to sell. This gorgeous Red/Tan sedan has been dealer serviced since brand new and can be used as an everyday driver or a weekend cruiser. You will not find a cleaner 190 E out there, and this one is ready to be enjoyed by its next lucky owner! Factory equipment includes: 2.6L I6 ENGINE, AUTOMATIC, ICE COLD AC, CRUISE CONTROL, POWER WINDOWS/LOCKS/MIRRORS, POWER LEATHER SEATS, AM/FM/TAPE, 16" ALLOY WHEELS, ABS, MERCEDES CAR COVER, and so much more... Absolutely everything works on this vehicle! The gauges and switches for every feature are operational, the engine starts up immediately and idles smoothly, the paint is glossy and smooth to the touch, the chrome is in perfect condition with no pits, the wheels and tires are in incredible shape, and there are no cracks/rips/tears in the dash, carpet, headliner, or upholstery. This 190 E is fully up to date on all service requirements, drives like a new car, and is ready to go today. This vehicle has been extremely well maintained in all areas; stepping into this car is like going back in time to a 1993 Mercedes showroom. This is a very well maintained, timelessly beautiful, and fun to drive classic sedan that is sure to turn heads and draw compliments wherever you go in it. Earth MotorCars specializes in selling the finest pre-owned vehicles in the country. Learn more about this vehicle by calling 877-610-8081 or via e-mail at sales@earthmotorcars.com . You will become a customer for life. Please call us at 877-610-8081

Seller's Notes: 2008 Mercedes Benz CLK 63- BLACK SERIES Exotic Classics is pleased to present this 2008 Mercedes Benz CLK 63 AMG Black Series. This CLK 63 Black Series is finished in Black over Premium AMG Black Leather Interior. The factory equipment consists of: I pod Integration Kit. The CLK 63 AMG Black Series was previously the Safety Car for Formula One Racing Performance and Handling come to you through a 6.3 litre V8 with 500 hp and 465 ln ft of torque, which goes through a 7 speed AMG Speed shift transmission, with manual mode as well. Acceleration 0-60mph: 4.1 seconds. The cabin is equipped with almost every luxury item available, AMG Premium Leather, Aluminum Carbon Fiber trim, 6 disc DD with Harmon Kardon Logic 7 surround sound, DVD based Navigation and so many other items the list is too long to list. This limited edition (350 total made for the US) Mercedes Benz is far from your average Mercedes. The 19 rims have 265-30 tires upfront, and 285-30's on the rear. Composite Brake Rotors, Sport tuned Suspension , 3 transmission modes, bigger roll bars and higher spring rates on the suspension, all work in harmony to provide a firm ride but not harsh. The flared wheel arches (carbon fiber), ultra aggressive front and rear fascia, carbon fiber diffusers and carbon fiber rear wing give the ultra performance look that can not be missed. The heavily bolstered sport seats will keep you in place as you test the handling. 12.6 quarter mile times, 0-60 in 4.1 seconds, original MSRP of $138,750.00 all make this a real value especially with only 7496 miles. Financing is available at the lowest rates as well as a complete line of extended warranty products and accessories. - Exotic Classics specializes in a superior product at a fair price. All of our vehicles are hand selected to appeal to the quality oriented buyer. Our staff is well versed in Exotic, Collectible and Premier vehicles. Please visit our website at www.exoticclassics.com. -

The CARFAX report for this 2008 CLK-Class CLK63 AMG highlights that it's a One-Owner vehicle, and for good reason. A One-Owner vehicle gives you the feel of owning a new vehicle without paying the new car price. Meticulously inspected -- Worry-free -- Quality assured. All of this comes with a Certified vehicle, like this 2008 Mercedes-Benz. This CLK-Class CLK63 AMG's level of quality is not meant for just anyone. It's meant for the person who strives for a classy, comfortable, and luxurious car. With all records included, feel comfortable knowing that the history of this CLK-Class CLK63 AMG is provided in order for you to make a knowledgeable decision. Adjectives like impeccable, spotless, and immaculate can be used to describe how clean this CLK-Class CLK63 AMG is, causing it to feel more like a new vehicle than a pre-owned one. Mercedes-Benz of Houston North wants you to drive off the lot with the confidence of knowing that your newly purchased CLK-Class CLK63 AMG is still covered under Mercedes-Benz's factory warranty. This peace of mind will be truly irreplaceable when purchasing a lightly-used vehicle. Fast and exciting, this CLK-Class CLK63 AMG is a true testament to the pursuit of automotive distinction by Mercedes-Benz. Once you're behind the wheel of this incredible machine, you will not think twice about purchasing this vehicle from Mercedes-Benz of Houston North. The CLK-Class CLK63 AMG is in a class on its own. So much so, that Mercedes-Benz didn't miss a beat when they loaded this vehicle with an abundance of a-la-carte options. You'll quickly realize how much you will need a navigation system once you are stopping for directions or looking up addresses on your phone instead of looking at the road. Seller's Notes: This one-owner, very low mileage 2008 Mercedes-Benz CLK63 Black Series is one you don't want to miss. It came to us from a client looking for a Porsche and had an original MSRP was $138,375. The racetrack-inspired CLK63 AMG Black Series coupe joined the lineup in 2008. It boasts a 500-horsepower 6.2-liter V8 along with a track-ready suspension, upgraded composite brakes, seriously supportive front seats. It is capable of launching from 0-60 in a mere 4.4 seconds. Only 350 were slated for delivery to the U.S. market. The Black Series coupe is the closest thing to a track car you can get from Mercedes, as it has a manually adjustable suspension, revised steering geometry, massive composite brakes (with six-piston front rotors), heavily bolstered sport seats and no backseat (deleted to save weight). This rare bird also features unique styling tweaks such as front fender vents and aggressive wheel arch flares. This vehicle comes with a Mercedes-Benz Certified Pre-Owned Warranty. This means that this vehicle has met Mercedes-Benz strict eligibility criteria and has passed their rigorous certification process. You will receive the benefit of a comprehensive limited warranty, 24-hour roadside assistance and nationwide dealer support. Contact a Sales specialist by calling 888-569-4580. Isringhausen Imports is the place to go for quality new cars and used cars for sale.

Seller's Notes: ONE OWNER, LOW MILEAGE, CLEAN CARFAX with Navigation, Heated Front Seats, Premium Harman Kardon Sound, SIRIUS, iPod Interface, Wood/Leather Steering Wheel, Full Leather, 17" 6-Twin-Spoke Alloy Wheels. This Exceptionally Low Mileage CLK350 Convertible comes with a Black Soft Top and Burl Walnut Interior Wood Trim. It was Sold and Serviced right here at Keenan and recently traded on a New Convertible. This Stunning Convertible adds the optional "Premium 1 Package" providing you with a Premium Harman Kardon Sound System, SIRIUS Satellite Radio (3 Month Subscription included with Purchase), iPod/MP3 Media Interface, Auto-Dimming Mirrors, and Integrated Garage Door Openers. The "Appearance Package" adds 17" 6 Twin-Spoke Alloy Wheels, a Sport Suspension, and Cross Drilled Brake Rotors. In addition, this CLK350 Convertible also adds an Easy to Use COMAND Navigation System, a Wood/Leather Steering Wheel, and Heated Front Seats to a long list of standard CLK-Class features. Like all of our Certified Pre-Owned Mercedes-Benz vehicles, this CLK350 Convertible was subjected to a rigorous 162 point inspection by a Mercedes-Benz trained technician to ensure it meets the highest standards. The next owner of this CLK350 is protected by the Mercedes-Benz Certified Pre-Owned Limited Warranty, which provides coverage for 1 year beyond the expiration of the original warranty OR up to 100,000 miles (whichever comes first). You even have the option to add up to 2 years of additional coverage! Please feel free to call or email us for warranty details on this particular car. Call today to arrange a no hassle, no obligation test drive. For more information contact Keenan Toll Free at 866-568-6832

Seller's Notes: This 2009 Mercedes-Benz CLK-Class CLK350 is offered to you for sale by Mercedes Benz of White Plains. The CARFAX report shows this Mercedes-Benz is a One-Owner vehicle. The 2009 Mercedes-Benz CLK-Class CLK350 Convertible continues to beat the competition in nearly every way. A sporty driving experience that still maintains impressive levels of ride comfort, along with an exceptional, driver-focused interior make the Mercedes-Benz a recommended pick among convertibles. This CLK-Class CLK350's level of quality is not meant for just anyone. It's meant for the person who strives for a classy, comfortable, and luxurious car. This Mercedes-Benz CLK-Class CLK350 is in great condition both inside and out. No abnormal wear and tear. Mercedes Benz of White Plains believes that everything about this CLK-Class CLK350 sounds great, but there's even one more reason why this vehicle is a great fit for you. This vehicle still falls under the manufacturer's warranty backed by Mercedes-Benz. The CLK-Class CLK350 has a navigation system installed, so you'll always know where you're going. This top-tier navigation system is reliable and will get you to your destination quickly and by the most efficient route available. More information about the 2009 Mercedes-Benz CLK-Class: Mercedes-Benz CLK-Class coupes and convertibles are luxurious, mid-size 2-doors that prioritize comfort and interior appointments above overt sportiness. The models have generously proportioned, supportive front seats across the line, while even the CLK-Class convertible is a rarity among drop-tops as a true 4-seater, with enough space for two in back. Interesting features of this model are smooth ride, comfortable rear seating, Awash in comfort, and luxury powerhouse Mercedes-Benz of White Plains is committed to delivering exceptional service, from the minute you enter our showroom, throughout the life of your vehicle and beyond. All of our pre-owned vehicles are Carfax checked and we offer service loaners and free car washes. In addition, we can arrange to have the car shipped anywhere in the US!

We value you as a customer and would love the chance to get you in this charming 2009 Mercedes-Benz CLK-Class. Mercedes-Benz Certified Pre-Owned means you get an additional 12 months Limited Warranty on top of the existing factory warranty, or up to 100,000 miles of coverage. We also do up to a 162-point rigorous inspection/reconditioning, 24/7 roadside assistance, trip-interruption services, and a complete CARFAX vehicle history report. At James Motor Company, we are proud to represent the Mercedes-Benz family of products. Please contact any of our Sales Consultants for a more in-depth explanation of the benefits and services provided by the Mercedes-Benz Certified Pre-Owned Warranty program. In addition, any remaining New Vehicle warranty will be honored along with the CPO warranty. For those desiring additional coverage, there are option plans that will afford your vehicle coverage for up to three years or 135,000 total vehicle miles, whichever comes first. James Motor Company's 11 member team of Sales Professionals has combined experience of almost 250 years. Remarkable? What's really remarkable is their dedication to their customers, the loyalty of those customers, and the relationships they have developed. This dedication is here for you as the next generation of buyers who are looking for a lasting relationship. Call James Motor company today!

This CLK350 Convertible comes with a Black Soft Top and adds the optional "Premium 1 Package" providing you with a Premium Harman Kardon Sound System, SIRIUS Satellite Radio (3 Month Subscription included with Purchase), iPod Integration Kit, Auto-Dimming Mirrors, and Integrated Garage Door Openers. The "Appearance Package" adds 17" 6-Twin-Spoke Alloy Wheels, Cross Drilled Brake Rotors, and a Sport Suspension. In addition, this CLK350 also includes an Easy to Use COMAND Navigation System, a Wood/Leather Steering Wheel, Heated Front Seats, and Burl Walnut Interior Wood Trim to a long list of standard CLK-Class features. Like all of our Certified Pre-Owned Mercedes-Benz vehicles, this CLK350 Convertible was subjected to a rigorous 162 point inspection by a Mercedes-Benz trained technician to ensure it meets the highest standards. The next owner of this CLK350 is protected by the Mercedes-Benz Certified Pre-Owned Limited Warranty, which provides coverage for 1 year beyond the expiration of the original warranty OR up to 100,000 miles (whichever comes first). You even have the option to add up to 2 years of additional coverage! Please feel free to call or email us for warranty details on this particular car. Call today to arrange a no hassle, no obligation test drive. For more information contact Keenan Toll Free at 866-568-6832

MERCEDES-BENZ CERTIFICATION STANDARDS AND MULTI-POINT INSPECTIONS: In addition to the rigorous Mercedes-Benz quality regulations, each Mercedes-Benz CPO is guaranteed to be a well-maintained, late-model Mercedes-Benz. Mercedes-Benz trained technicians put every CPO vehicle through a 162-point mechanical and cosmetic inspection and is backed by a detailed CARFAX Vehicle History Report. Multi-point Inspections: 14 point road test inspection. 15 point drivetrain and undercarriage inspection. 11 point general inspection. 11 point engine compartment inspection. 17 point engine component inspection. 25 point chassis and body inspection. 3 point post road test inspection. 33 point electrical system inspection. 33 point appearance inspection. 2. WARRANTY INFORMATION: With every Certified Pre-Owned Mercedes-Benz comes peace of mind, because every MBCPO vehicle is backed by one of the most comprehensive pre-owned vehicle limited warranties available. For starters, any remaining portion of the Mercedes-Benz four-year/50,000 mile New Vehicle Limited Warranty applies to the vehicle. After that, MBCPO Limited Warranty provides comprehensive vehicle for another 12 months, or up to 100,000 total accumulated miles. For those MBCPO vehicles that are no longer covered by the New Vehicle Warranty, the MBCPO Limited Warranty takes effect at the time of delivery. 3. SERVICE AND SUPPORT: With 1-800-FOR-MERCEDES (866-651-7118) you are only a phone call away fr It is our mission to provide an extraordinary automotive purchase experience. This is our pledge to you. You can trust that you will be treated with courtesy and respect by people who genuinely care. Park Place Dealerships. recipient of the prestigious Malcolm Baldrige Award for quality excellence. Seller's Notes: SIRIUS Satellite Radio. Mercedes-Benz Certified! Black Knight! Who could say no to a simply great convertible like this outstanding 2009 Mercedes-Benz CLK-Class? Mercedes-Benz Certified Pre-Owned means you get an additional 12 months Limited Warranty on top of the existing factory warranty, or up to 100,000 miles of coverage. We also do up to a 162-point rigorous inspection/reconditioning, 24/7 roadside assistance, trip-interruption services, and a complete CARFAX vehicle history report. Take some of the worry out of buying an used vehicle with this one-owner creampuff. This convertible is nicely equipped with features such as SIRIUS Satellite Radio, 4-Wheel Disc Brakes, 6 Speakers, ABS brakes, Air conditioning, Alloy wheels, AM/FM radio, AM/FM/WB w/6 Disc CD Changer, Anti-whiplash front head restraints, Audio memory, Auto tilt-away steering wheel, Auto-Dimming Mirror, Automatic temperature control, Bodyside moldings, Brake assist, Bumpers: body-color, Burl Walnut Wood Trim, CD player, CLEAN CARFAX, Convertible roof wind blocker, Delay-off headlights, Driver door bin, Driver vanity mirror, Dual front impact airbags, Dual front side impact airbags, Electronic Stability Control, Emergency communication system, Four wheel independent suspension, Front anti-roll bar, Front Bucket Seats, Front Center Armrest w/Storage, Front dual zone A/C, Front fog lights, Front reading lights, Gar ............Pre-Owned Manager, Bob Binette, takes great pride in the certification process and exceeds the certification standards set by Mercedes-Benz. He has designed pre-owned specials personally and loves nothing more than to see his customers drive away happily in their dream vehicle. Don't miss out on these special events! This is your chance to get into the Mercedes-Benz of your dreams.

Seller's Notes: CLEAN CARFAX, LOW MILEAGE, SOLD & SERVICED HERE AT KEENAN - Navigation, Heated Front Seats, Premium Harman Kardon Sound, SIRIUS, iPod Integration Kit, 17" 6-Twin Spoke Alloy Wheels, Wood/Leather Steering Wheel. This CLK350 Convertible comes with a Black Soft Top and adds the optional "Premium 1 Package" providing you with a Premium Harman Kardon Sound System, SIRIUS Satellite Radio (3 Month Subscription included with Purchase), iPod Integration Kit, Auto-Dimming Mirrors, and Integrated Garage Door Openers. The "Appearance Package" adds 17" 6-Twin-Spoke Alloy Wheels, Cross Drilled Brake Rotors, and a Sport Suspension. In addition, this CLK350 also includes an Easy to Use COMAND Navigation System, a Wood/Leather Steering Wheel, Heated Front Seats, and Burl Walnut Interior Wood Trim to a long list of standard CLK-Class features. Like all of our Certified Pre-Owned Mercedes-Benz vehicles, this CLK350 Convertible was subjected to a rigorous 162 point inspection by a Mercedes-Benz trained technician to ensure it meets the highest standards. The next owner of this CLK350 is protected by the Mercedes-Benz Certified Pre-Owned Limited Warranty, which provides coverage for 1 year beyond the expiration of the original warranty OR up to 100,000 miles (whichever comes first). You even have the option to add up to 2 years of additional coverage! Please feel free to call or email us for warranty details on this particular car. Call today to arrange a no hassle, no obligation test drive. For more information contact Keenan Toll Free at 866-568-6832

MERCEDES-BENZ CERTIFICATION STANDARDS AND MULTI-POINT INSPECTIONS: In addition to the rigorous Mercedes-Benz quality regulations, each Mercedes-Benz CPO is guaranteed to be a well-maintained, late-model Mercedes-Benz. Mercedes-Benz trained technicians put every CPO vehicle through a 162-point mechanical and cosmetic inspection and is backed by a detailed CARFAX Vehicle History Report. Multi-point Inspections: 14 point road test inspection. 15 point drivetrain and undercarriage inspection. 11 point general inspection. 11 point engine compartment inspection. 17 point engine component inspection. 25 point chassis and body inspection. 3 point post road test inspection. 33 point electrical system inspection. 33 point appearance inspection. 2. WARRANTY INFORMATION: With every Certified Pre-Owned Mercedes-Benz comes peace of mind, because every MBCPO vehicle is backed by one of the most comprehensive pre-owned vehicle limited warranties available. For starters, any remaining portion of the Mercedes-Benz four-year/50,000 mile New Vehicle Limited Warranty applies to the vehicle. After that, MBCPO Limited Warranty provides comprehensive vehicle for another 12 months, or up to 100,000 total accumulated miles. Seller's Notes: This is a one-owner 2009 Mercedes-Benz CLK350 convertible with an original MSRP of $62,565. The convertible version of the CLK maintains clean lines, especially when its traditional cloth top is retracted. There is also no shortage of power in the 2009 CLK350 with over 260 horsepower. And in true Mercedes-Benz tradition it offers a solid chassis, a composed ride, comfortable front seats, and fast power top operation. Safety is not limited either with stability control, antilock disc brakes with brake assist, active front head restraints, and pop-up roll bars (that automatically deploy in a rollover) located behind the rear seats which are all standard. Optional features of this CLK350 include: Premium 1 Package, Appearance Package, Bluetooth hands-free communication kit, wood/leather steering wheel, DVD COMAND Navigation, Burl Walnut Wood trim, and heated front seats. This vehicle comes with a Mercedes-Benz Certified Pre-Owned Warranty. This means that this vehicle has met Mercedes-Benz strict eligibility criteria and has passed their rigorous certification process. You will receive the benefit of a comprehensive limited warranty, 24-hour roadside assistance and nationwide dealer support. Contact a Sales specialist by calling 888-569-4580. Seller's Notes: Desert European Motorcars Ltd. is honored to present a wonderful example of pure vehicle design... this 2008 Mercedes-Benz CLK-Class CLK350 only has 37,408 miles on it and could potentially be the vehicle of your dreams! With adjectives like sporty, classy, and downright indulgent to describe the 2008 CLK-Class CLK350, you'll love every minute of owning and driving this convertible. You may never go back to a closed-cabin car! This CLK-Class CLK350's level of quality meant for the person who strives for a classy, comfortable, and luxurious car. The CLK-Class CLK350 is well maintained and has just 37,408 miles. This low amount of miles makes this vehicle incomparable to the competition. More information about the 2008 Mercedes-Benz CLK-Class: With the exception of the high-performance 2008 CLK63 AMG Black Series, the Mercedes-Benz CLK Class coupes and convertibles are luxurious mid-size two-doors that prioritize comfort and interior appointments above overt sportiness. The models have generously proportioned, supportive front seats across the line, while even the CLK convertible is a rarity among drop-tops as a true four-seater, with enough space for two in back. Both of the CLK63 AMG models-especially the Black Series-offer a different, more exclusive equipment set, with scorching, track-ready performance without a big sacrifice in comfort. Interesting features of this model are otherworldly performance (AMG models), Awash in comfort, luxury powerhouse, convertible models boast a legitimate back seat., and smooth ride

Seller's Notes: This is a nice one-owner 2008 Mercedes-Benz CLK350 that has come back to us from a client who had the service work done here by our Certified Mercedes-Benz Technicians. The original MSRP was $59,155. The convertible maintains clean lines and there is no shortage of power in the CLK350 with over 260 horsepower. And in true Mercedes-Benz tradition it offers a solid chassis, a composed ride, comfortable front seats, and fast power top operation. Safety is not limited either with stability control, antilock disc brakes with brake assist, active front head restraints which are all standard. Optional features of this CLK350 include: Premium 1 Package, Sport Appearance Package, Heated Seats, and more. Contact a Sales specialist by calling 888-569-4580. A One-Owner vehicle gives you the feel of owning a new vehicle without paying the new car price. Those shopping for a sporty convertible would be wise to check out this Mercedes-Benz CLK-Class 3.5L. With the versatility to easily switch between open-air and closed-cabin driving, it's hard to ignore the everyday practicality of this CLK-Class. This CLK-Class 3.5L's level of quality is not meant for just anyone. It's meant for the person who strives for a classy, comfortable, and luxurious car. The mileage on this CLK-Class 3.5L is reflective of it's age and you can tell. The previous owner took great care of this vehicle so that you'll be able to enjoy the benefits of a well cared for vehicle offered to you by Mercedes-Benz of Sugar Land. This CLK-Class 3.5L is covered under Mercedes-Benz's reliable & trusted factory warranty. So, if you're in the market for an incredible vehicle which provides the manufacturer-backed assurance that everyone deserves, then this is the vehicle for you. More information about the 2009 Mercedes-Benz CLK-Class: Mercedes-Benz CLK Class coupes and convertibles are luxurious, mid-size 2-doors that prioritize comfort and interior appointments above overt sportiness. The models have generously proportioned, supportive front seats across the line, while even the CLK convertible is a rarity among drop-tops as a true 4-seater, with enough space for two in back. Strengths of this model include smooth ride, comfortable rear seating, Awash in comfort, and luxury powerhouse We welcome the opportunity to answer any of the questions you may have. Seller's Notes: Florida Auto Gallery is proud to present this LOW MILEAGE 2009 Mercedes CLK 550 convertible. This is a very clean, two-owner Florida vehicle with a certified clean CARFAX report. Luxury is syonymous with Mercedes, and this CLK lives up to that name and will surely not disappoint. This Mercedes convertible comes loaded with features and amenities, including the high-demand color combination of the CAPRI BLUE METALLIC exterior with the STONE leather interior trim with BLUE soft top. This 2009 Mercedes CLK 550 convertible is propelled by a 5.5-liter V8 engine that produces a healthy 382 hp and 391 lb-ft of torque. The seven-speed automatic transmission provides butter-smooth shifts exactly when they're needed. The CLK 550's structural rigidity, combined with front and rear double wishbone independent suspension helps provide a wonderfully smooth ride. The steering is solid and precise, creating a tangible connection to the road and the CLK's four-wheel disc brakes with ABS ensure true stops. The interior maintains the elegant, modern simplicity of the exterior. The cockpit is filled with real wood and rich leather appointments. Our entire inventory at Florida Auto Gallery is hand selected, freshly serviced and fully documented including complimentary CARFAX and vehicle history reports. We welcome independent pre-purchase inspections and financing is available for qualified customers. We will also gladly coordinate nationwide or worldwide shipping door to door making your purchase easy and enjoyable. We accept TRADES and will pay TOP DOLLAR for your PREMIUM VEHICLES. Contact us at 877-211-6628.

Seller's Notes: Low-mileage 2008 Mercedes-Benz CLK350 Convertible finished in elegant black on black and just two owners from new. This CLK originally sold for almost $58,000 when new and is equipped with $3,000 in factory upgrades that include the P1 Package, iPod Integration and heated front seats. The P1 option package consists of premium Logic7 surround sound audio, 6-disc CD changer in the glove box, auto-dimming mirrors and Homelink universal garage door opener. It is powered by a potent 3.5L V6 motor and 7-speed automatic gearbox good for 260+ hp and a great 28mpg EPA rating. Other standard features include a power soft top with heated glass rear window, wind deflector, dual-zone automatic climate control, interior wood trim, dual power seats, driver memory settings, multi-function steering wheel and rain-sensing wipers. $57,970 original MSRP. Purchase includes a spare remote key, owners books, 2-owner CarFax and 71-point inspection at the Park Place LTD Service Center.
